title: 2014/101/EU: Council Decision of 18 February 2014 appointing a Czech member of the Committee of the Regions
header:
21.2.2014 EN Official Journal of the European Union L 52/17
COUNCIL DECISION
of 18 February 2014
appointing a Czech member of the Committee of the Regions
(2014/101/EU)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty on the Functioning of the European Union, and in particular Article 305 thereof,
Having regard to the proposal of the Czech Government,
Whereas:
(1) On 22 December 2009 and on 18 January 2010, the Council adopted Decisions 2009/1014/EU (1) and 2010/29/EU (2) appointing the members and alternate members of the Committee of the Regions for the period from 26 January 2010 to 25 January 2015.
(2) A member’s seat on the Committee of the Regions will become vacant following the end of the term of office of Mr Bohuslav SVOBODA,
main_body:
The following is hereby appointed as member of the Committee of the Regions for the remainder of the current term of office, which runs until 25 January 2015:
— Mr Tomáš HUDEČEK, Primátor hl. města Prahy.
This Decision shall enter into force on the day of its adoption.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 February 2014.
For the Council
The President
G. STOURNARAS
(1)  OJ L 348, 29.12.2009, p. 22.
(2)  OJ L 12, 19.1.2010, p. 11.
